```{r, message=F, warning=F}
upper_posterior=c(2, 3, 4, 5, 12, 13, 14, 15)
```

```{r, message=F, warning=F}
m_tooth_yes=tooth_migration %>% filter(M_Tooth_Migration=="Y") %>% nrow()
m_tooth_all=tooth_migration %>% filter(M_Tooth_Migration=="Y" | M_Tooth_Migration=="N") %>% nrow()

d_tooth_yes=tooth_migration %>% filter(D_Tooth_Migration=="Y") %>% nrow()
d_tooth_all=tooth_migration %>% filter(D_Tooth_Migration=="Y" | D_Tooth_Migration=="N") %>% nrow()

prop.test(x=c(m_tooth_yes, d_tooth_yes), n=c(m_tooth_all, d_tooth_all))
```

* M_tooth_migration has frequency of 14.29%, and D_tooth_migration 1.74%. these two frequencies are significantly different with p value $7.43 \times 10^{-8}$.
